column3: Latest;Sihanoukville: A Department of Labor and Vocational Training spokesman told a local website on December 26
column4: that after it was decided to close online gambling businesses
column5: which will be completed by the end of 2019
column6: a number of casinos have ceased their business operations
column7: which has resulted in the loss of about 7
column8: 700 Cambodian casinos worker jobs.------Yuv Khemara confirmed that four casinos had decided to close their operations
column9: while 23 casinos had laid off many staff
column10: (33?) casinos have suspended business temporarily.------The Preah Sihanouk Provincial Department of Labor and Vocational Training has received complaints of both collective and individual labor disputes
column11: many of the latter are labor disputes over casinos closing down.------On August 18
column12: the government of Cambodia issued notice to end all online gambling activities by January 1
